name: Goji OG
description: Goji OG is a sativa-dominant hybrid bred by Bodhi Seeds crossed between Nepali OG and Snow Lotus. The flavor is as unique as the berry it's named after, offering a dynamic aroma including red berry, black cherry, strawberry, hawaiian punch, and licorice. Indoor or outdoor grows offer high yields with a flowering time of around 9 weeks.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Energetic, Depression, Stress, Pain, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Anxious
